data.name: Decimated
data.detailed_description:
Team & Community

Decimated is being developed by Fracture Labs. We are an independent studio of industry veterans collaborating on the project from all around the globe.

We encourage community feedback and often organize Q&A sessions and discuss progress through live broadcasts on our Twitch channel and the official Discord server. Join us to learn more and contribute!


Alpha Development

Decimated is in alpha, and has a lot more work to be done. Everything you see so far is a placeholder and will be improved upon as we develop the game.



The pre-alpha demo demonstrates multiplayer 3rd person combat, 3 classes with special abilities, grenades, jetpacks, hover/land vehicles & AI.

The team's vision for Decimated is a cyberpunk multiplayer online roleplaying game with survival elements, visually inspired by Bladerunner, Robocop (Paul Verhoeven) & Wes Ball's short film RUIN.


About the Game

Decimated is a multiplayer third-person survival role-playing game, developed using Unreal Engine 5, and set in a persistent dystopian cyberpunk universe.

All players begin as human citizens and can develop their character into various classes through training and equipment. Law-abiding, trained citizens may join the ranks of cyber police to safeguard the global order.

A vast and hostile apocalyptic environment offers a plethora of challenges for any style of gameplay. Anyone can become a resource collector, a chauffeur, a medic, a mechanic, a smuggler, an outlaw, and much more.



Players can compete against each other, or cooperate to explore, scavenge, trade, conquer territory, build bases, or complete missions for rewards. Aside from other players, enemies also include NPCs such as malfunctioning robots. The enormous map can be traversed by land, sea, and hover vehicles.

To survive, players must find food, water, and in some cases, oxygen. Injured players have to treat their wounds or risk bleeding to death. Treated patients may become addicted to medications, affecting their performance and judgment.

If a player dies, they will respawn with limited items but secure safes and safehouses will be available to store valuables and respawn from.



Decimated is set in 2187. Earth has been abandoned after hundreds of years of destructive climate change and catastrophic neglect of the environment by corporations and industry. Political and social unrest has left the old cities decimated and hostile to life. Civilization has collapsed and destroyed itself, yet a cyborg police force still wields control over the wastelands.

Only privileged first-class citizens were permitted onto the new world. The unworthy who were left behind – criminals, rebels, political dissidents, and the poor – scavenge in the forgotten cities of Earth, which have become overgrown with jungle, flooded by swamps, swallowed by sand and frozen by ice.



Pollution and technological debris litter the environment, and survivors have set up shelter in destroyed skyscrapers, laboratories, abandoned metros and crumbling freeways.

The world is inhabited by criminals, pirates, bounty hunters, drug lords, slavers, cannibals, victims of genetic experiments and malfunctioning robots, all competing for resources and territory. The cops enforce a totalitarian authority even after society is in ruin, forcing humans to live in the wastelands.



  • Engage in PVP against other players
  • Choose from a variety of human or cyborg character roles such as Medic, Mechanic, Hacker, Bounty Hunter, Mercenary, Marauder and Sniper
  • Explore a vast cyberpunk city surrounded by an apocalyptic wasteland
  • Sign up for legal and illegal missions for low- or high-risk rewards, alone or in a group
  • Buy, sell, and trade items with other players through the virtual market
  • Attack or defend convoys, VIPs, and cargo shipments across the map
  • Buy, rent and customize your own apartment
  • Capture, purchase, or build wasteland bases and shelters
  • Customize a wide range of vehicles, weapons, drones, characters & augmentations



We have a lot more in store for Decimated. The following are some of the planned features:

  • Additional character classes and cybernetic augmentations
  • Character progression, levelling, and skill systems
  • Advanced vehicle systems, trade routes, and shipments
  • Weapon and armour durability and upgrades
  • Crafting, markets, and user-generated content
  • PVE instances with AI enemies and bosses
  • Cyberpunk metropolis and desert area with events, biomes and points of interest
  • Meta gameplay

data.short_description: Decimated is a 3rd person multiplayer online survival RPG. Fight against or team up with other players, scavenge loot, transport cargo or VIPs to other locations, collect legal or illegal resources and trade them, hunt legendary creatures, capture territory and build safehouses for their gang.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7/i5 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA Geforce GTX670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Decimated® and DIO® are registered Trademarks
